Title: Health
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Important Commands: duel, health, rest
Currently the Castle is a pretty safe place--except for the occasional duel. Dueling can be a dangerous thing. When you're in a duel, if you're getting the worst of it (which you can see with the "health" command), you can try to "rest", but beware--your opponent may take advantage of this lapse.
Repeated duels with sharpened weapons can result in death, so be careful about entering a new duel if you're already injured, else you may be returning to the Necromancer's caverns.
See Also: Combat, Death
